responses: Hello! How can I help you today?

You can sign up at /signup.html or I can guide you through the process.

For support, visit /contact.html or tell me your issue and I'll escalate it.
Our support team is available Monday–Friday, 9am–6pm (local time).

Anytime — let me know if you need anything else.
